title: Bootable USB Disk Tools_Windows 8_64bit Installer+HHDreg+PuppyUB
description:
Bootable USB Disk Tools_Win8_64bit Installer+HHDreg+PuppyUBuntu+Ghost15+Acronis

Ive developed a bootable Installer USB and LiveCD/DVD runnable OSes and
Disk Repair Tools all on one 8GB key disc.


just use the included Drive to Drive Sector copier tool for windows to write
the file to any Drive... Ideally a 8gb Pen Drive or Flash Drive or Key Disc
or whatever you want to call them :)

Tested on Vmware/Acer TravelMate DualCore Laptop 2gb/HP ProBook 4530 i7 8gb


It boots to GRUB boot manager to load or start the Installer

saves you hunting down all those Disk Repair Tools on CDs etc


Included
=========

Win 8 64bit installer (Upgrade or FULL installer) 

Win 7 PE

PuppyLinux 4.12 

PuppyLinux 5.5 Slacko with PAE support (boots very fast and should find sound video and network card automatically) Use it right away

Ghost 15 bootable (So can backup and Restore Drives)

Acronis Disk Director Suite 11 (so can repartition Drives)

Memory Testers

HDD Regenerator 2011 HHDreg (Hard drive Regen) 2011 (Can recondition Drive Sectors)
Note! it drops out with unable to run on HP Probook 4530 with SATA SSD
drive. not sure why but suspect its cos of SSD

Ubuntu 13 32 and 64 bit Desktop (latest builds as of 15 Jul 2013)

On root of USB also are various Add-ons and Tools for Windows..


ENJOY and help seed.. 


SEEDING will be very slow until my data cap resets in 7 hours time.

if connecting stay connected 24x7
leechers will probably be detected and block,

so be fair and HELP SEED! Im share 7gb of bandwidth here and it took
days to put this together and test it.
